comments.text:
I was pretty empty and alone inside till I grew a beard.  Now I obey the 
beard.  It really helps when I'm lost in the middle of the woods and need 
an AC outlet so I can plug in my USB charger and charge my phone.  Never 
been lost in the middle of the woods since!  Worst case, if the phone gets 
lost, my beard has a built in GPS as well.  I mean, it pretty much does 
everything.﻿
